ing: 1 small Granny Smith apple, peeled and diced
des: "This warm, sweet compote is a great accouterment to pork and possibly a Christmas turkey. It can also be served warm over a scoop of vanilla ice cream for the daring. Happy holidays!"
ins: Heat mashed persimmons in a saucepan over medium heat. Stir apple, brown sugar, cinnamon, ginger, lemon juice, and lemon zest into persimmons. Bring mixture to a boil, reduce heat to medium-low, and simmer until sauce is desired consistency and flavors blend, 10 to 15 minutes.
